dialogues.speaker: Jumpy
dialogues.text: I love your hat! Where did you get it?

dialogues.speaker: RapperSpring
dialogues.text: Yo! This hat is top-tier style, I wear the best with flair and guile!

dialogues.speaker: Jumpy
dialogues.text: Nice rhyme! Do you always talk like that?

dialogues.speaker: RapperSpring
dialogues.text: Yeah, every sound I hear, every sight I see, it all turns to rhymes when it flows from me!

dialogues.speaker: Jumpy
dialogues.text: Alright, can you make a rap about me?

dialogues.speaker: RapperSpring
dialogues.text: Yo, are you jumping or falling? Your curse keeps calling! Tell me, Jumpy, is being a spring so tough, or are you just stalling?

dialogues.speaker: RapperSpring
dialogues.text: My rapâ€™s sharp and tight, it hits with full might. Like a curse on a spring, it clings day and night!
